devdoc.author: SuperdaoTeam
devdoc.details: Create a new role identifier for Admin, Creator, SUDO-permissioner. This contract module, as multi-signature wallet, allows to implement role-based access control mechanisms. This is a lightweight version that puts admin addresses is in a form of set of wallet with access to admin-controlling functions.

AddAdmin(address).details: Declare events for adding and removing admins

addAdmin(address).details: Function adds an admin, if only admin or SUDO permission executes this, later the function is executed and otherwise, an exception is thrown.

adminAddresses().details: Returns an array of admins addresses

batchCall(address[],bytes[]).details: Function invokes arrays of calldata addresses and calldata data, if only admin or SUDO permission executes this. Returns values as results, which formes from a loop, where index should be strictly less than data.length.

call(address,bytes).details: Function invokes receiver's address and all transmitted info in calldata, if only admin or SUDO permission executes this. Returns values of functionCall. The function executes correctly, otherwise an exception (INVALID_AUTHORIZATION_ERROR) is thrown.

constructor.details: This is the constructor which registers trustedForwarder in ERC2771Context

initialize(address,address[],address).details: It provides permission management for access to application contracts functions, plus in the loop adds admins' addresses if the number is less than the existing amount of admins.

isAdmin(address).details: Returns a boolean value indicating whether the admin status is succeeded.

removeAdmin(address).details: Function removes an admin, if only Creator or SUDO permission executes this, later the function is executed and otherwise, an exception is thrown.

setCreator(address).details: Function sets a new Creator with Creator's address, if only SUDO permission executes this.

devdoc.title: AdminController
